desc: Nostalgic Threadz shop focuses on collecting pieces from the 80’s, 90’s & y2k eras including Looney Tunes, Disney, and retro streetwear brands. What started as a collection of nostalgia, turned into a selfmade female led small business. Nostalgic Threadz is meant to be a hug from your younger self. <3

layout.text: carefully handpicked vintage, inspired to evoke childhood memories.
